TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCAnimationCache extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Singleton that manages the Animations. It saves in a cache the animations. You should use this class if you want to save your animations in a cache.
Docs.remarks: <para> <verbatim>Singleton that manages the Animations. </verbatim> It saves in a cache the animations. You should use this class if you want to save your animations in a cache.</para><verbatim>Singleton that manages the Animations. </verbatim><para>Before v0.99.5, the recommend way was to save them on the <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCSprite" />. Since v0.99.5, you should use this class instead.</para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCSprite" /><para> <para>v0.99.5 </para> </para><para>v0.99.5 </para><para>v0.99.5 </para>
